body_html:
When running a semantic segmentation model on an android device, I run into another issue that readMultiDimentionalArray() in copyTo() costs a lot of time.

When using android profiler, it looks like this:

In the figure, copyTo() costs totally 88.22ms. shapeOf() costs 7.14ms and readMultiDimentionalArray() costs 81.07ms. The shape of the output tensor is (1, 128, 128, 1).

Is there possible solution to reduce the time of this function?
body_text:
When running a semantic segmentation model on an android device, I run into another issue that readMultiDimentionalArray() in copyTo() costs a lot of time.
When using android profiler, it looks like this:

In the figure, copyTo() costs totally 88.22ms. shapeOf() costs 7.14ms and readMultiDimentionalArray() costs 81.07ms. The shape of the output tensor is (1, 128, 128, 1).
Is there possible solution to reduce the time of this function?
body:
When running a semantic segmentation model on an android device, I run into another issue that `readMultiDimentionalArray()` in `copyTo()` costs a lot of time.

When using android profiler, it looks like this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8468820/48178309-db8c5d00-e353-11e8-8b8d-df4d33f6ebd5.png)

In the figure, `copyTo()` costs totally 88.22ms. `shapeOf()` costs 7.14ms and `readMultiDimentionalArray()` costs 81.07ms. The shape of the output tensor is (1, 128, 128, 1). 

Is there possible solution to reduce the time of this function?
